name: Racing Car Jewels: New Discove
description:
Racing Car Jewels: New Discovery is the brand and mixture of real stunt challenges. Drive the most furious sports cars, drift around the traffic at top speed or stunt jump on the asphalt ramps.
Features:
- Realistic view and Marvellous 3D game graphics.
- Easy gameplay and Smooth controls.
- High Quality sounds effects.
- Narrow ramps and extreme hurdles to cross.
- Nitro boost to perform insane acrobatic stunts.
- Different camera angles to make simulation driving easy.
- Best sports cars collection.
